TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox/ObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListBox.ObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 中项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储 中显示的项。The class stores the items displayed in the . 类中定义了另外两个集合，使你能够确定在此集合中选择了哪些项。There are two other collections defined within the class that enable you to determine what items are selected within this collection. 类提供的属性和方法用于确定在 中选择了哪些项，而 类可用于确定所选 中的哪些索引。The class provides properties and methods for determining what items are selected within the , while the class enables you to determine what indexes within the are selected. 可以通过多种方法向集合中添加项。There are a number of ways to add items to the collection. 方法提供向集合添加单个对象的功能。The method provides the ability to add a single object to the collection. 若要将多个对象添加到集合中，请创建一个项的数组，并将其分配给 方法。To add a number of objects to the collection, you create an array of items and assign it to the method. 如果要在集合中的特定位置插入一个对象，则可以使用 方法。If you want to insert an object at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除项，可以使用 方法或 方法（如果你知道项在集合中的位置）。To remove items, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the item is located within the collection. 使用 方法，您可以从集合中移除所有项，而不是使用 方法一次删除一个项。The method enables you to remove all items from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single item at a time. 你还可以使用 属性来操作 的项。You can also manipulate the items of a by using the property. 如果使用 属性将项添加到 中，则可以使用 属性查看 中的项，但不能使用 的方法在列表中添加或移除项。If you use the property to add items to a , you can view the items in the using the property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the . 除了用于添加和删除项的方法和属性外， 还提供用于在集合中查找项的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items within the collection. 利用 方法，您可以确定对象是否为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an object is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道该项位于集合中，就可以使用 方法来确定项在集合中的位置。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个所有者描述的 ，方法是将 属性设置为 `OwnerDrawVariable` 值并处理 和 事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置 和 属性以及如何使用 方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到将 命名空间和 命名空间导入的空窗体中。To run this example, paste it into an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 从窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法调用 `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of based on another .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能创建此类的实例，而无需将其与 控件相关联。You cannot create an instance of this class without associating it with a control. 此版本的构造函数使你能够使用 类的现有实例中指定的项在创建时将项添加到集合中。This version of the constructor enables you to use the items specified in an existing instance of the class to add items to the collection when it is created. 您可以使用此构造函数将其他 控件中指定的项与此集合一起使用。You can use this constructor to use the items specified in another control with this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(object item) cil managed
Public Function Add (item As Object) As Integer

param.name: item
param.span: 一个对象，它表示要添加到集合中的项。

span.span: An object representing the item to add to the collection.

summary.span: 向 的项列表添加项。

span.span: Adds an item to the list of items for a .

returns.span: 集合中项的从零开始的索引；如果已调用 ，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item in the collection, or -1 if has been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的 属性设置为 `true`，则该项将按字母顺序插入列表中。If the property of the is set to `true`, the item is inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，项将插入到列表的末尾。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 若要将某项插入列表框中的特定位置，请使用 方法。To insert an item into the list box at a specific position, use the method. 若要在一个操作中将一组项添加到列表框中，请使用 方法。To add a set of items to the list box in a single operation, use the method. 如果要使用 方法将大量项添加到列表中，请使用 和 方法，以防止每次将项添加到列表中时，每次向列表中添加项时都将 重画。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the list, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting each time an item is added to the list until all items are added to the list. 向 添加项时，先对项进行排序并添加新项会更有效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 将对象添加到集合时， 首先会检查 类的 属性是否具有指定为在获取项文本时引用的对象的成员的名称。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果 属性没有指定的成员，则 然后调用对象的 方法，以获取要在列表中显示的文本。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件在列中显示多个项，并且可以在控件的列表中选择多个项。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 示例的代码使用 类的 方法将50项添加到 ，然后使用 方法从列表中选择三项。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然后，该代码显示来自 集合（通过 属性）和 的值（通过 属性）。The code then displays values from the collection (through the property) and the (through the property). 此示例要求代码位于 的和中。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . [!code-cpp[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: There is insufficient space available to add the new item to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的 属性设置为 `true`，则项会按字母顺序插入列表中。If the property of the is set to `true`, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，项将按照它们在数组中出现的顺序插入。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order that they occur within the array. 此方法通常传递 对象的数组，但任何类型的对象的数组都可传递给此方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 将对象添加到集合时， 首先会检查 类的 属性是否具有指定为在获取项文本时引用的对象的成员的名称。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果 属性没有指定的成员，则 然后调用对象的 方法，以获取要在列表中显示的文本。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. 使用此方法将项添加到 时，无需调用 和 方法来优化性能。When using this method to add items to the , you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. 向 添加项时，先对项进行排序并添加新项会更有效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 您可以使用此方法向列表中添加一组项，或重复使用存储在不同 中的项。You can use this method to add a group of items to the list or to reuse the items stored in a different . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个所有者描述的 ，方法是将 属性设置为 `OwnerDrawVariable` 值并处理 和 事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置 和 属性以及如何使用 方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到将 命名空间和 命名空间导入的空窗体中。To run this example, paste it into an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 从窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法调用 `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListBoxExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的 属性设置为 `true`，则项会按字母顺序插入列表中。If the property of the is set to `true`, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，项将按照它们在数组中出现的顺序插入。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order that they occur within the array. 此方法通常传递 对象的数组，但任何类型的对象的数组都可传递给此方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 将对象添加到集合时， 首先会检查 类的 属性是否具有指定为在获取项文本时引用的对象的成员的名称。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果 属性没有指定的成员，则 然后调用对象的 方法，以获取要在列表中显示的文本。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list. 使用此方法将项添加到 时，无需调用 和 方法来优化性能。When using this method to add items to the , you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. 向 添加项时，先对项进行排序并添加新项会更有效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 您可以使用此方法重复使用存储在不同 中的项。You can use this method to reuse the items stored in a different .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够在 中的特定位置插入项。This method enables you to insert an item at a specific position within the . 如果 的 属性设置为 true，则将该项添加到排序列表中的正确位置，而不考虑 `index` 参数中指定的值。If the property of the is set to true, the item is added in the correct position within the sorted list regardless of the values specified in the `index` parameter. 将对象添加到集合时， 首先会检查 类的 属性是否具有指定为在获取项文本时引用的对象的成员的名称。When an object is added to the collection, the first checks to see if the property of the class has the name of a member from the object specified to reference when obtaining the item text. 如果 属性没有指定的成员，则 然后调用对象的 方法，以获取要在列表中显示的文本。If the property does not have a member specified, the then calls the method of the object to obtain the text to display in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从列表中删除项时，列表中的后续项的索引会发生更改。When you remove an item from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the list. 删除的项的所有信息都将被删除。All information about the removed item is deleted. 您可以使用此方法，通过指定要从列表中移除的实际项从列表中移除特定项。You can use this method to remove a specific item from the list by specifying the actual item to remove from the list. 若要指定要删除的项的索引而不是项本身，请使用 方法。To specify the index of the item to remove instead of the item itself, use the method. 若要从列表中删除所有项，请使用 方法。To remove all items from the list, use the method.

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to remove.

summary.span: 删除集合中指定索引处的项。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified index within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从列表中删除项时，列表中的后续项的索引会发生更改。When you remove an item from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the list. 删除的项的所有信息都将被删除。All information about the removed item is deleted. 您可以通过指定要从列表中移除的项的索引，使用此方法从列表中移除特定项。You can use this method to remove a specific item from the list by specifying the index of the item to remove from the list. 若要指定要删除的项而不是项的索引，请使用 方法。To specify the item to remove instead of the index to the item, use the method. 若要从列表中删除所有项，请使用 方法。To remove all items from the list, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与 属性一起使用，以将当前选定项移到 显示区域中项列表的顶部。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 该示例还演示了如何使用 类的 方法删除项，以及如何使用 方法清除所有项选择。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 代码首先将 中当前选定的项移动到列表的顶部。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 然后，该代码移除当前选定项之前的所有项，并清除 中的所有选择。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 此示例要求将包含项的 添加到窗体中，并且当前在 中选择了该项。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . [!code-cpp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/VB/form1.vb#1)]
